trans-unit.source: Provides the default implementation of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate"></xref> object, which ASP.NET uses whenever it parses two-way data-binding within the templated content of an ASP.NET control such as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>.

ASP.NET uses the CompiledBindableTemplateBuilder class whenever it parses declarative two-way data-binding within the templated content of an ASP.NET control such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>.
It is not meant to be used directly in your code.

For more information about ASP.NET data binding, expressions, and syntax, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742) and [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.CompiledBindableTemplateBuilder"></xref> class.
A delegate used to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.CompiledBindableTemplateBuilder.InstantiateIn*> method call.
A delegate used to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.CompiledBindableTemplateBuilder.ExtractValues*> method call.
Retrieves a set of name/value pairs for values bound using two-way ASP.NET data-binding syntax within the templated content.

The ExtractValues method is the <xref:System.Web.UI.CompiledBindableTemplateBuilder> class's implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate.ExtractValues%28System.Web.UI.Control%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.

The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> from which to extract name/value pairs, which are passed by the data-bound control to an associated data source control in two-way data-binding scenarios.
The name represents the name of the data item field specified as the first parameter to bind within templated content.
The value is the current value of a property value bound using two-way ASP.NET data-binding syntax.
Defines the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> object that child controls and templates belong to.
These child controls are in turn defined within an inline template.

The InstantiateIn method is the <xref:System.Web.UI.CompiledBindableTemplateBuilder> class's implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate.InstantiateIn%28System.Web.UI.Control%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to contain the controls that are created from the inline template.
